sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './Home.scss' import bg from '../../images/bg.svg' import Aux from '../../hoc/Aux'; import Fade from 'react-reveal/Fade'; import bigData from '../../images/big-data.svg' import migration from '../../images/cloud-migrate.svg' import throughput from '../../images/throughput.svg' import devops from '../../images/devops.svg' import logo from '../../images/logo.png'; import Form from '../Forms/Form' const Home = () => { const isMobile = (window.innerWidth < 900) return( { isMobile ? : null }

One Stop Shop For All Your Cloud Needs.

With modern technology and major events leading to the remote interaction of employees and clients alike, the push to migrate to the cloud are larger than ever before. With security, reliable data flows, and positive customer experience all critical, ScaleHaus is here to jump start your company in all of your cloud and delivery needs.

How will ScaleHaus Transform Your Business?

Cloud Migration

Whether you are looking to migrate from on-prem or migrate from one cloud provider to another, we remove the headache.

Monitoring

Whether it be server monitoring or APM, ScaleHaus will make sure you don't miss a beat. Catch issues before your clients.

DevOps & Enhanced Delivery

Make deployments flawless. Save resources by streamlining deployments and eliminating manual tasks.

Big Data

Data flows and the accessibility of large amounts of data have become increasingly difficult to manage and maintain.
) } export default Home;
